description: Two great things in this update. Alana is one in a million: beautiful, sweet, tons of fun, and loves big cocks (that red dong is over 3 inches in diameter). And she gets to be the first to ride the Rocker built by our friend Dan, magnificent in it's simplicity and orgasm-giving abilities. Look for the link to Dan's site in the 'Machine Makers' section of the links pages.
title: Alana
